attributes.action: Make it criminal to deny a child their other parent
attributes.additional_details: ▪︎ dealing with this , ,, make the parents pay fines,if notes parental classes ,, child physiology classes to understand the importance of a childs first 5 years of life.
attributes.background:
I know its crucial for a child to have the right to both parents irrelevant of parents past , present future issues !!! 
You created a child so you should show responsibility for that child regardless of anything.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
